Description:
An individual working as a Senior Data Scientist at Confiz is seen as a person who is technically strong and has an experience of communication with client. You will be required to understand the requirements, assign tasks to junior team members and monitor their overall performance. An exceptional Senior Data Scientist will assume a prominent role in development of his junior team members.Responsibilities:Effectively work in a matrix organization. Lead through influence 
Get things done attitude
Ensure timely delivery of work
Lead junior team members
Excellent communication and data storytelling skills 
Work in a cross-functional and in a collaborative environment
Organize and prioritize multiple projectsRequirements:Minimum 3 years of hands-on experience in Data Science field
Bachelor's degree in computer science or a related field is required
Master’s Degree with a specialization in Data Science would be a plus
Solid understanding of mathematics, statistics and probability. 
Hands on experience in Python scientific computing eco-system (pandas, numpy, scikit-learn and matplotlib) 
Familiarity with SQL and R (tidyverse and caret) is a plus 
Proficiency in the machine learning workflow including data wrangling, feature engineering and model selection and evaluation 
Excellent understanding and working knowledge of Machine learning models: 
Supervised (Classification, Regression)  
Unsupervised 
Anomaly detection, dimensionality reduction and clustering
Experience with Time Series models in either of the following: 
Statistical models i.e. (ARIMA, exponential smoothing, Prophet) 
Boosting and tree based models like XGBoost and Lightgbm 
Neural Networks (RNN like LSTM and other variations of RNN etc.) based models. 
Familiarity with PySpark or deploying machine learning models in production would be a plus We have an amazing team of 550+ individuals working on highly innovative enterprise projects & products. Our customer base includes fortune 5 retail and CPG companies, leading store chains, fast growth fintech and multiple Silicon Valley startups.What makes Confiz stand out is our focus on processes and culture. Confiz is ISO 9001:2015 certified. We have a vibrant culture of learning via collaboration and making workplace fun.People who work with us work with the cutting-edge technologies while contributing success to the company as well as to themselves.
